## LaunchOptions.waitForInitialPage property

Whether to wait for the initial page to be ready. Useful when a user explicitly disables that (e.g. `--no-startup-window` for Chrome).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
waitForInitialPage?: boolean;
```
